page.title: 12TRANSPORT
page.content: TO LIVE IN KIRKLEVINGTON DOMESDAY BLOCK WE NEED TRANSPORT. Every family has at least 1 or 2 cars. {Public transport}CLEVELAND transit, united. {School transport}Bus,Taxi or private car or on foot. {Further transport}Teeside airport, Trains from Eaglecliffe,Darlington hovercraft,Channel ferry. {Childrens} M.Bikes,Bangers, Mopeds, Racers and feet{13 downover } Bmx, Yamaha, Sledge, Tricicle, Go cart, Roller Skate. {New transport Microlite and sinclair (C5).{ {Farming} Tractor, Muck spreader, Horse box, Forklift truck and Combine Harvester(Â£30,000)hired.
